item.title: The Visual Similarity of Movie Posters
item.description: Recently this past winter my friends and I were trying to find something to watch on one of the major video streaming services and as as usual, we were drowning in decision paralysis.

item.title: A Low Cost Approach to Improving Pedestrian Safety with Deep Learning
